Key Match Events: Phil Salt hit the fastest over by a West Indian in a T20 World Cup (30 runs in 38 balls)
West Indies set a new record of 51 dot balls in a T20 World Cup when posting a score of at least 180
Post-Match Reflections: Phil Salt deserved the Player-of-the-Match award
Jos Buttler expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Adil Rashid is the pick of the bowlers with 1 for 21 from his four overs
Rovman Powell hit five sixes in his innings
Others: West Indies set a new unwanted record of 51 dot balls in a T20 World Cup
England ran three more runs in 15 fewer deliveries compared to West Indies
